short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect with people who share your intellectual interests based on your ChatGPT and web browsing patterns.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find Real Friends helps you discover like-minded individuals who share your intellectual interests and learning goals on ChatGPT.

üîí Privacy First
- We only track when you visit ChatGPT and URLs you've visited
- Stop tracking instantly with one click
- No personal information is collected
- Your conversations remain private
- All data is processed securely

ü§ù Smart Matching
- Connect with others exploring similar topics
- Find study partners and learning companions
- Discover people with complementary interests
- Get notified when potential matches are found

‚ú® Key Features
- Privacy-focused design
- One-click tracking controls
- Pause or resume anytime
- Simple and intuitive interface

Join a community of curious minds and expand your intellectual network while maintaining your privacy. You're always in control - pause tracking whenever you want and resume when you're ready to discover new connections.
